location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript on paper.Dimensions: 828 x 1016mm, on sheet 850 x 1040mm.

mods.abstract: Map of the south-eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula, showing the boundaries of the Aden Protectorate and various proposed lines for the boundaries of south-eastern Arabia and Qatar. In addition to boundaries the map indicates hydrology and tribal areas, and provides some indication of relief. A key of reference indicates some of the boundaries and features. A note in the bottom right-hand corner states that the map was drawn by Sapper R Bunyan. The scale is given as 1 inch to 32 miles.
